column4: I just installed ubuntu K.  I have my desktop set to log-in automatically.  Still, every time I log in, the keyring asks for my password.  I have two questions: 1) How do I change this keyring password.  2) How do I let it log me in automatically?
Question 3) Can Empathy alert me to new hotmail emails?  As of now, it doesn't seem to be doing this

I hate to do this but, here are my first two questions again: I just installed ubuntu K.  I have my desktop set to log-in automatically.  Still, every time I log in, the keyring asks for my password.  I have two questions: 1) How do I change this keyring password.  2) How do I let it log me in automatically?
have you tried the system settings section?
